data.text:
FUNDAMENTAL BUG: Chain layout recalculates and re-centers ALL tile positions on every board update. This causes the entire game to shift/move as tiles are added.

CORRECT BEHAVIOR:
- First tile placed at table center - position is FIXED
- Each new tile placed relative to chain end - then FIXED
- Once a tile is placed, it CANNOT move
- Only calculate position for newly added tile

Current algorithm rebuilds from pivot and applies centering offset - this is wrong. Need to store positions incrementally and never recalculate existing tiles.
